content: ready to take your crochet skills up to the major leagues this free crochet baseball keychain pattern is a fun and creative project that you re sure to love whether you re a crochet newbie or a seasoned expert our step-by-step video tutorial will help you hit a home run express your love for baseball in a unique way and craft a personalized gift for the sports lover in your life discover the joy of diy with our easy-to-follow guide let s get crafting and unlock a world of fun with crochet **the pattern is free with ads on my website ** > but you can also purchase the ad-free > printer-friendly pdf here on ravelry > this pattern can also be found in my > crochet membership which includes over > 400 patterns and 100s of video > tutorials you can join the membership > here 1 ***you can also get this baseball keychain pattern in an ebook with 8 additional crochet sports ball patterns right here 2 *** 1 https //www nickishomemadecrafts com/crochet/the-crochet-club/ 2 https //nickinhc--nickishomemadecrafts thrivecart com/crochet-sports-ball-keychains-made-easy/ ref=ravelry
